text: Kasonero, ki onon mexonand, xud [ʙo parastis va nakukori] vasilae [ʙaroi taqarruʙ] ʙa Parvardigorason mecujand [va dar raqoʙatand, to ʙidonand] kadom jak az az onon [ʙa parastisi Alloh taolo] nazdiktarand va ʙa rahmatas umedvorand va az azoʙas metarsand; [caro ki] ʙe tardid, azoʙi Parvardigorat hamvora soistai parhez ast
